thread.title: Becky

author: Becky
title: Becky
text:
After finding I had a flat tyre I decided to see if I could find a company that would come out to me and fit new tyres - luckily I was working from the home office for most of the week, making this an option. Since my tyres were due changing I decided to book for both front tyres to be replaced and went for a high-end product rather than cheap ones which wouldn't last as long.
On the day of fitting, Ben gave me a call to say that he was 10 minutes away. Once he arrived, the service was very quick and Ben was a very pleasant company representative. I was very grateful to have had such a good experience and would definitely use the company again.
